info.title: Manyfold API
info.description:
This document describes the REST API for this [Manyfold](https://manyfold.app) instance.

Warning! This API...

* ... is not complete! Functionality is limited for now, but future releases will add more capabilities.
* ... is not yet at v1! It's subject to breaking changes at any time.
* ... is only valid for this host! Other Manyfold instances running different software versions may expose a different set of API functionality.

href.description: The URL to the full NodeInfo document

get.summary: Get server metadata in NodeInfo 2.0 format

303.description: Redirect to oembed version of the provided URL

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify which page of results to retrieve.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description:
Specify order of results; either by name or creation time:
 * `name` 
 * `recent`

name.description: The human name of the collection

401.description: Unuthorized; the request did not provide valid authentication details

403.description: Forbidden; the provided credentials do not have permission to perform the requested action

422.description: Creation failed due to invalid data

client_credentials.description: Authentication with the OAuth2 Client Credentials grant flow. You can generate client app credentials at /oauth/applications.

scopes.public: read public data accessible without logging in
scopes.read: read data accessible to the OAuth application's owner
scopes.write: create or change data that the OAuth application's owner has appropriate permissions for
scopes.delete: remove data that the OAuth application's owner has appropriate permissions for

description.example: This is my collection of favourite things

description.description: A longer description for the collection. Can contain Markdown syntax.
